description:
Jojo and the others look for a boat to take to Cairo where DIO awaits. Meanwhile, Chaka was walking along a nearby beach where he finds a sword. The men he`s with all try to draw the sword with no luck, but then Chaka tries and is easily able to draw the sword. The sword glows eerily and Chaka suddenly hears a mysterious voice, changing his usually calm demeanor. What is the true identity of this sword?
Source: crunchyroll
